name: get_vector_tile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cartorapid.
Tool description: CartoRapid est une API de tuiles Raster et Vector couvrant en profondeur le territoire fran√ßais. Usable with Leaflet and Maplibre
API description: This endpoint returns Vector tiles as PBF. 
Vector tilles are tiles that can be used with mapping libraries such as Maplibre.

y.description: The Y coordinate of the tile.

z.description: The zoom level of the tile.

x.description: The X coordinate of the tile.
